lines.irish:
Half eight, pleasing not much of a top
No more mála fa choinne Móglai Bap
lines.english:
Half eight, not wearing much of a top
No more bag for Móglai Bap

lines.irish:
Fear úr nua ag fágáil slán leis an clap
‘Nois beidh [?] ort muna n-íocann tú straip
lines.english:
A new man saying goodbye to the clap
Now you’ll be [??] unless you pay a strip

lines.irish:
Léine deas úr don oíche anocht
Agus dhíol mé deich kilo cóc so níl me bocht
lines.english:
A fresh new shirt for tonight
And I sold ten kilos of coke so I’m not broke

lines.irish:
Gach uile dhuine hooked ach ní ormsa an locht
Mar tá Nike Air Max daor, thart fa ochtó punt
lines.english:
Everyone's hooked but it’s not my fault
Because Nike Air Max are dear, about 80 quid

lines.irish:
Right, fast forward
Swig amháin eile, sipín beag Stella, le cuidiú le mo bhuama
lines.english:
Right, fast forward
One more swig, small sip of Stella to help with my buzz

lines.irish:
Go fóill stuama, Bouncer insan cúinne, looks like a welter
Díreach i mó shúile
lines.english:
Still steady, bouncer in the corner, looks like a welterweight
Right in my eyes

lines.irish:
"Not tonight mate, I think you’ve had enough"
So thug me dorn san aghaidh dó agus bhris me a phus
lines.english:
"Not tonight mate, I think you’ve had enough"
So I punched him in the face and broke his jaw

lines.irish:
Tháinig ceann amháin eile boot cúl le mo chos
Just let me know mate when you’ve had e-fucking-nough
lines.english:
Another came and booted the back of my leg
Just let me know mate when you’ve had enough

lines.irish:
Na bac leis an cac a tugann bouncers duit
Sure, tá sé beagnach trí bhliain ó a bholadh sé phit
lines.english:
Ignore the crap bouncers give you
It’s been nearly three years since he smelled a bit

lines.irish:
Agus ní labhraíonn sé lena mháthair
He says she's a bitch
lines.english:
And he doesn’t talk to his mother
He says she’s a bitch

lines.irish: Is focain cunt mór ramhar é ach tá pleain agaim anois
lines.english: He’s a big fat fuckin’ cunt but I’ve got a plan now

lines.irish: Eagróidh muid ár áit féin, gan bouncers, gan péas
lines.english: We’ll organise our own place, no bouncers, no cops

lines.irish: An áit lan cócain, lán mná, lán grá, people we can entertain
lines.english: A place full of cocaine, full of women, full of love, people we can entertain

lines.irish: Foc bouncers asking for your date of birth and your name
lines.english: Fuck bouncers asking for your date of birth and your name

lines.irish:
Bouncers, níos measa ná na péas
Bouncers, cosúil leis an S.S
Bouncers, níos deise insan Kesh
Knocking me back agus wreckin' the sesh
lines.english:
Bouncers, worse than the cops
Bouncers, like the S.S.
Bouncers, nicer inside the Kesh
Knocking me back and wrecking the sesh

lines.irish:
Cad é an focain craic? An bhfuil na speakers ar an bhhealach?
Tá súil agam gur chíos tú iad níl mise chun iad a cheannach
lines.english:
What the fuck’s the craic? Are the speakers on the way?
I hope you paid for them, I’m not buying them

lines.irish:
DJ Próvaí ar na tunes, bangers go deo
Agus ullmhaidh muid na cannaí [?] daoine leo
lines.english:
DJ Próvaí on the tunes, proper bangers
And we’ll prep the cans [?] for people with them

lines.irish:
Cur na soilse anseo, os comhair na decks
Níl aon focain dress code, cuir ort Nike Air Max
lines.english:
Put the lights here, in front of the decks
There’s no fucking dress code, wear your Nike Air Max

lines.irish:
Caith aon rúd ar mhaith leat agus focain relax
Mar anocht ní bheidh aon focain bouncers san áit
lines.english:
Wear whatever you want and fucking relax
Because tonight there’ll be no fuckin’ bouncers in the place

lines.irish:
Mar thosaigh muid ciorcáil cómhra
Idir na Mas agus na bouncers móra
lines.english:
Because we started a circle of dialogue
Between the MAs and the big bouncers

lines.irish:
Agus ní nach ionadh go bhfuil daoine ag smaoineadh
An bhfaca mé na dirty focain bouncers ag caoineadh?
lines.english:
And it’s no surprise people are wondering
Did I see the dirty fuckin’ bouncers crying?

lines.irish:
Let it all out, mo chara's here for a cry
I’m only joking now imigh as mo radharc and die
lines.english:
Let it all out, my friend’s here for a cry
I’m only joking, now get out of my sight and die

lines.irish:
Is cuma le Mo Chara, so foc faoi do chuid fadhbanna
Mar gheall ar na oícheanta ar fhagadh mé sna sráideanna
lines.english:
Mo Chara doesn’t care, so fuck your problems
Because of all the nights I was left in the streets

lines.irish:
Bouncers, níos measa ná na péas
Bouncers, cosúil leis an S.S
Bouncers, níos deise insan Kesh
Knocking me back agus wreckin' the sesh
lines.english:
Bouncers, worse than the cops
Bouncers, like the S.S.
Bouncers, nicer inside the Kesh
Knocking me back and wrecking the sesh

lines.irish:
Bí go deas, cneas(ta), ciúin ag iarraidh áit a aimsiú
"Hello, kind sir, would you like Christ to find you?"
lines.english:
Be nice, gentle, quiet trying to find a place
"Hello, kind sir, would you like Christ to find you?"

lines.irish:
Bí muiníneach, cliste, gan aon rud a briseadh
Just éist go cúramach, seo an dóigh é a dhéanadh
lines.english:
Be confident, clever, don’t break anything
Just listen carefully, this is how to do it

lines.irish:
Coinnigh súil géar amach agus béidh tú go brea
Agus coinnigh píosa beag hash ar feadh teacht an Ra
lines.english:
Keep a sharp eye and you’ll be grand
And keep a little hash for the arrival of Ra

lines.irish:
Mar atá i ngnáth nuair a thagann siad gan a rá
We say "fuck the Queen" agus "tiocfaidh ár lá"
lines.english:
As is normal when they come without warning
We say "fuck the Queen" and "our day will come"

lines.irish:
Do rogha féin ar an bealach isteach
We got smoke, cóc, hash agus frosty jack
lines.english:
Your own choice at the entrance
We’ve got smoke, coke, hash and frosty jack

lines.irish:
We got dídeain, even if you’re wrecked
Agus no focain bouncer ag cur stop leis an craic
lines.english:
We’ve got shelter even if you're wrecked
And no fucking bouncer stopping the craic

lines.irish:
We got milseáin when your jaws flyin’ it
We got uisce when you really feelin’ it
lines.english:
We’ve got sweets when your jaw is flying
We’ve got water when you're really feeling it

lines.irish:
We got a strict new policy guaranteed:
Níl fáilte roimh na Gardaí
lines.english:
We’ve got a strict new policy guaranteed:
The cops are not welcome

lines.irish:
Ná íoc isteach and tóg iompair amach
And foc bouncers, ná tabhair aon aitheantais leat
lines.english:
Don’t pay in and take carry-out
And fuck bouncers, don’t bring any ID

lines.irish:
Tá sé faoi smacht, it's self-policed anocht
Seo blaisín den muirtheas atá le teacht
lines.english:
It’s under control, it’s self-policed tonight
This is a taste of the mayhem to come

lines.irish:
Ó Kneecap, triúir focain cheeky bastards
Your dad’s a disgrace and your life’s a disaster
lines.english:
From Kneecap, three fuckin' cheeky bastards
Your dad’s a disgrace and your life’s a disaster

lines.irish:
Cá bhfuil do dheirfiúir? An bhfuil achan rud casta?
Mar phléasc mé go luath agus d’imigh mé go gasta
lines.english:
Where’s your sister? Is everything a mess?
Because I blew up quick and left just as fast

lines.irish:
Bouncers, níos measa ná na péas
Bouncers, cosúil leis an S.S
Bouncers, níos deise insan Kesh
Knocking me back agus wreckin' the sesh
lines.english:
Bouncers, worse than the cops
Bouncers, like the S.S.
Bouncers, nicer inside the Kesh
Knocking me back and wrecking the sesh

lines.irish:
("Nah lads, that’s not fair
They're only doin' their job, so they are")
lines.english:
("Nah lads, that’s not fair
They're only doing their job, so they are")
